code:
import axios from'axios';import{del,get,post,put}from"./api_helper";import*as url from"./url_helper";// Gets the logged in user data from local session 
var getLoggedInUser=function getLoggedInUser(){var user=localStorage.getItem('authUser');if(user)return JSON.parse(user);return null;};//is user is logged in
var isUserAuthenticated=function isUserAuthenticated(){return getLoggedInUser()!==null;};// Register Method
var postRegister=function postRegister(url,data){return axios.post(url,data).then(function(response){if(response.status>=200||response.status<=299)return response.data;throw response.data;}).catch(function(err){var message;if(err.response&&err.response.status){switch(err.response.status){case 404:message="Sorry! the page you are looking for could not be found";break;case 500:message="Sorry! something went wrong, please contact our support team";break;case 401:message="Invalid credentials";break;default:message=err[1];break;}}throw message;});};// Login Method
var postLogin=function postLogin(url,data){return axios.post(url,data).then(function(response){if(response.status===400||response.status===500)throw response.data;return response.data;}).catch(function(err){throw err[1];});};// postForgetPwd 
var postForgetPwd=function postForgetPwd(url,data){return axios.post(url,data).then(function(response){if(response.status===400||response.status===500)throw response.data;return response.data;}).catch(function(err){throw err[1];});};// get Events
export var getEvents=function getEvents(){return get(url.GET_EVENTS);};// add Events
export var addNewEvent=function addNewEvent(event){return post(url.ADD_NEW_EVENT,event);};// update Event
export var updateEvent=function updateEvent(event){return put(url.UPDATE_EVENT,event);};// delete Event
export var deleteEvent=function deleteEvent(event){return del(url.DELETE_EVENT,{headers:{event:event}});};// get Categories
export var getCategories=function getCategories(){return get(url.GET_CATEGORIES);};// get Products
export var getProducts=function getProducts(){return get(url.GET_PRODUCTS);};// get Product detail
export var getProductDetail=function getProductDetail(id){return get("".concat(url.GET_PRODUCTS_DETAIL,"/").concat(id),{params:{id:id}});};// get orders
export var getOrders=function getOrders(){return get(url.GET_ORDERS);};// add order
export var addNewOrder=function addNewOrder(order){return post(url.ADD_NEW_ORDER,order);};// update order
export var updateOrder=function updateOrder(order){return put(url.UPDATE_ORDER,order);};// delete order
export var deleteOrder=function deleteOrder(order){return del(url.DELETE_ORDER,{headers:{order:order}});};// get cart data
export var getCartData=function getCartData(){return get(url.GET_CART_DATA);};// get customers
export var getCustomers=function getCustomers(){return get(url.GET_CUSTOMERS);};// get shops
export var getShops=function getShops(){return get(url.GET_SHOPS);};// get chats
export var getChats=function getChats(){return get(url.GET_CHATS);};// get groups
export var getGroups=function getGroups(){return get(url.GET_GROUPS);};// get Contacts
export var getContacts=function getContacts(){return get(url.GET_CONTACTS);};// get messages
export var getMessages=function getMessages(){var roomId=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"";return get("".concat(url.GET_MESSAGES,"/").concat(roomId),{params:{roomId:roomId}});};// post messages
export var addMessage=function addMessage(message){return post(url.ADD_MESSAGE,message);};export{getLoggedInUser,isUserAuthenticated,postRegister,postLogin,postForgetPwd};
